title: Bee Stings
body:
Bees are my least favourite wilderness creature. For something so small, they hurt a hell of a lot, and get around really quick, so you're never safe near the walls. One time I tried to squish one under my foot, and he just crawled out and flew away. On top of that, whether they use their flashy speed or not, they always find a way behind you to sting you in the back of the neck. They grow up quickly, and reproduce very effectively. And some bees are very, very toxic.

- Too Much Damage
- Too Fast
- Much Toxic Bee

Please nerf Bee Stings.
